maintainers.name: Samuel Wilson
maintainers.bio: A Ruby on Rails dev by day, a Rust and Smalltalk programmer by night. I have found Pharo Smalltalk a delight to use. I'm here to spread the good news.

maintainers.name: Tim Mackinnon
maintainers.bio: I'm the co-inventor of Mock Objects, Gold Cards, and many retrospective techniques, but still a developer at heart using Pharo as a platform to explore further exciting new ideas.
